content: introducing the rainbow pocket market bag crochet pattern perfect for eco-conscious shoppers and crafters alike this pattern is designed for advanced beginners and features a beautiful mesh design with colorful stripes worked in the round the detailed photo tutorial and written instructions make it easy to follow along and create your very own market bag the twist with the rainbow pocket market bag is the double layer at the bottom which lets the whole bag fold up into a handy size to throw in your tote or car the finnish version is available on the blog only **unique features-** bag folds up into the bottom so you can toss it in your daily bag or glove box crochet mesh pattern for a breathable and sturdy market bag easy to customize with your own colors detailed photo tutorial and written pattern for clear instructions colorful stripes add a pop of fun and style to your market bag **materials needed-** hook 5 5mm us size 9 0 yarns **bernat handicrafter** https //amzn to/3yie8x9 or **lily sugar n cream** https //amzn to/4jqpppr 4/medium/worsted weight cotton 200 yds total button optional - instructions for making a button are also included
